trans-unit.source: Refreshes the activity designer verbs associated with the designer by calling the status handler.
trans-unit.target: 刷新通过调用状态处理程序的设计器关联的活动设计器谓词。

trans-unit.source: Designer verbs are shown in context menus and menu bars.
trans-unit.target: 设计器谓词显示在上下文菜单和菜单栏。

trans-unit.source: Calling RefreshDesignerVerbs will refresh the menus to show any recent changes.
trans-unit.target: 调用 RefreshDesignerVerbs 将刷新菜单以显示任何最新更改。

trans-unit.source: Stores the view state of the designer into a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: 将设计器的视图状态存储到二进制流。

trans-unit.source: The view state is the accumulation of the values of designer properties.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态是设计器属性的值的累计。

trans-unit.source: When the view state is saved to a stream, the designer values and settings can be restored using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.LoadViewState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当视图状态保存到流时，设计器的值和设置可以还原使用<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.LoadViewState%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.LoadViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> into which the view state is stored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>到存储的视图状态。</xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: Shows the specified info tip.
trans-unit.target: 显示的指定的信息提示。

trans-unit.source: Use ShowInfoTip to show a rectangle of text that can be used to display extended information about the designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ShowInfoTip 显示可以用于显示有关设计器的扩展的信息的文本的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the InfoTip.
trans-unit.target: 要在信息提示中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Displays the info tip for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> with the specified title and text.
trans-unit.target: 显示的信息提示<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>与指定的标题和文本。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the title of the info tip.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含信息提示的标题。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the info tip text to display.
trans-unit.target: 包含要显示的信息提示文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Displays the specified tool tip in the specified rectangle location.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的矩形位置显示指定的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the tool tip to display.
trans-unit.target: 包含要显示的工具提示的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the location at which to display the tool tip.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>定义，此处显示的工具提示的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the activity should show a smart tag.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示活动是否应显示智能标记。

trans-unit.source: Use ShowSmartTag to determine whether to show a smart tag when an activity has focus in the designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ShowSmartTag 来确定是否显示智能标记时活动设计器中具有焦点。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the activity should show a SmartTag; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果活动应显示智能标记;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的大小<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use size to adjust the height and width of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用大小来调整的高度和宽度的活动设计器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> ，它表示的区域<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle where the smart tag should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取应在其中显示智能标记的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Use together with <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.SmartTagVerbs%2A> to display a smart tag of available designer actions at the location specified by SmartTagRectangle.
trans-unit.target: 同时使用<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A>和<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.SmartTagVerbs%2A>SmartTagRectangle 所指定的位置显示可用设计器操作的智能标记。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.SmartTagVerbs%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The rectangle where the smart tag should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 应在其中显示智能标记的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of designer actions to associate with a smart tag on the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 获取要与活动设计器上的智能标记关联的设计器操作的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb"></xref> read-only collection to associate with the activity designer's smart tag.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb"> </xref>要与活动设计器的智能标记关联的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the base component with which the activity designer is associated.
trans-unit.target: 获取与活动设计器关联的基组件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Component%2A> represents the activity that the activity designer designs on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Component%2A>表示活动设计器设计工作流设计图面的活动。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Component%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> with which the activity designer is associated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>与活动设计器关联。

trans-unit.source: Performs the default action associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 执行与设计器关联的默认操作。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DoDefaultAction%2A> causes the default action associated with the designer to be executed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DoDefaultAction%2A>导致要执行的设计器关联的默认操作。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DoDefaultAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer with the associated activity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化具有关联的活动设计器。

trans-unit.source: The IComponent to initialize the designer with.
trans-unit.target: 若要初始化设计器的 IComponent。

trans-unit.source: Gets the design-time verbs associated with the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 获取与活动设计器关联的设计时谓词。

trans-unit.source: The design-time verbs associated with the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 与活动设计器关联的设计时谓词。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of attributes that it exposes through a TypeDescriptor.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，允许设计器更改或删除项的通过 TypeDescriptor 它公开的属性集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the TypeIDs of the attributes of the class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含 Typeid 的类的属性</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of events that it exposes through a TypeDescriptor.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，允许设计器更改或删除的一套它通过 TypeDescriptor 公开的事件中的项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the event names of the class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含事件名称的类。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of properties that it exposes through a TypeDescriptor.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，允许设计器更改或删除的一套它通过 TypeDescriptor 公开的属性中的项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the property names of the class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含属性名称的类。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to add items to the set of attributes that it exposes through a TypeDescriptor.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，允许设计器将项添加到的 TypeDescriptor 通过它公开的属性集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the TypeIDs of the attributes of the class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含 Typeid 的类的属性</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to add items to the set of events that it exposes through a TypeDescriptor.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，允许设计器将项添加到组的事件，它通过 TypeDescriptor 公开。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the event names of the class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含事件名称的类。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows a designer to add items to the set of properties that it exposes through a TypeDescriptor.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，允许设计器将项添加到它通过 TypeDescriptor 公开的属性集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the property names of the class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含属性名称的类。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Returns a view object for the specified view technology.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的视图技术的视图对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>被强制转换为<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.GetView%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.GetView%2A>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"> </xref>为其返回视图对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the view for this designer.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示此设计器的视图的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the array of technologies that the activity designer can support for its display.
trans-unit.target: 获取活动设计器可以为其显示提供支持的技术的数组。

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a deriving class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.SupportedTechnologies%2A> returns a single-member array that contains <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 除非在派生类中，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.SupportedTechnologies%2A>返回的单成员数组，其中包含<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.SupportedTechnologies%2A>重写

trans-unit.source: An array of supported <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 支持的阵列<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified Toolbox item is supported by the current activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 确定当前的活动设计器是否支持指定的工具箱项。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果工具箱支持该工具，并可以启用;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
